about_the_game:
Vi.dange is a contemplative experience where you play a human subject placed in the path of his own light.
You will evolve step by step, to the rhythm of the observations and the mediations proposed in order to discover your true identity.

You will progress slowly in first-person view through an enigmatic corridor, discovering the different visual and sound works placed on your way.
25 works to discover to reach the end of your adventure.

Available only in French
Dont forget to consult the link to the manual

content_descriptors.notes: Some visual and sound works contain nudity.
